faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions

items.question: How can I create an owner account?
items.answer: You can create an owner account by clicking the 'Create owner account' button on the login page and filling out the registration form.

items.question: What are the platform pricing plans?
items.answer: We offer several plans tailored to your needs. Contact us for a personalized quote based on the number of properties you manage.

items.question: How can I add my properties?
items.answer: Once logged into your owner space, go to the 'Properties' section and click 'Add property' to enter your property information.

items.question: Is the platform secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use the latest security technologies to protect your data. All information is encrypted and stored securely.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2020, our platform revolutionizes property management by offering modern and intuitive tools.
story.paragraph1: Born from a passion for innovation in the real estate sector, our company was created to address modern rental management challenges.
story.paragraph2: Today, we support hundreds of property owners in efficiently managing their real estate assets.
